Why Apache?Â¶

We have chosen the Apache v2.0 license because it is liberal and supports broad use and modification of the software. The Apache license allows other projects with virtually any license, including GPL, to use our code, and makes it more likely that we will attract support from companies, including open-source software companies, such as Enthought and Kitware.
